documents.document:
Microblogging Enhances the Value of SNS

SNS, full name social networking service, specifically refers to the internet applicable service designed to help people build social networks. How to Have On like Katherine Heigl in ugg classic cardy It also refers to popular and mature information carriers existed, such as SMS messaging service. Most Brilliant ugg bailey button Hot Another common explanation of SNS: Social Network Site, ie the "social Web" or "social net."

When ordinary people can have computing and communications resources which may compare to the web server by installing the SNS software, what will those Internet companies investing in a large number of servers do? What are their advantages? Will there be more new Internet companies, whose front end and background might not be present Google, EBAY or Sina model? Even the 3 million strong server clusters of which the operator like Shanda games is proud is the core competitiveness? When the machine in a cartoon's home can play his work through the SNS video device, does he need to go to manage a website? Probably a housewife does not know Html programming, doed not know the word site, but she can only use the SNS cookbook publishing program and a PC in the kitchen to help millions of people master her craft, and her stances on the stove is quite clear. What are you thinking at that time? In today's Internet now, we as the clients are like a dummy, do some slavery things only through the server, look at other people's sites, play other people's games, send emails, in addition to these, we have no freedom.

Now is the time to start a revolution! Central task of the revolution: how to let more than 10 million computers play their own roles, let users create and control their own information, without the company's servers manipulating us. Individual power is weak, the birth of the Internet makes syntaxis of individuals' and strange forces in a short time possible, while SNS makes the possibility become a reality. The ultimate significance of SNS is to integrate the scattered individuals in the Internet orderly and organicly, just like the silk thread strung pearls. The key is to make the pearls find the pearls and the fish balls find the fish balls. If an SNS always let the fishball fall into the pearl base, or vice versa, it is definitely a disaster.

To let the same type of individuals associate perfectly is the core application of SNS. Now almost all of the SNS take the webgame as the core applications for getting users together, which is obviously a departure from the basic value of SNS. SNS takes human relations as a basis. The user inevitably have the behaviour characteristics of participation, communication and sharing. This kind of behaviour spends a lot of time. Therefore, the core applications of SNS should invovle two basic characteristics of simple operation and high frequency property of participation. Internet application which now can meet the two characteristics is only the microblog.

Living the life from the days into the scripts is the inevitable result of the information age and the rapid urbanization, which is also the reason why microblog is highly regarded. Significance of microblog for the individual is not confiding but listening. Individuals will be more concerned about the content published by the objects followed, and associate by responses. This series of acts like release, attention, following, recovery, re-release form a virtuous communication cycle. Each man and followed object form a small circle, a number of which link together to form a SNS Network. Microblog makes SNS more valuable. Microblog can not be said to be the only core application of SNS, but the success of microblog definitely can promote the success of SNS, which is of course only the success on applications. From the time used, the mobile terminal has more potential than a computer to become the main platform of SNS. The successful commercial application must tie the other twin brother SMS. Microblog and text message are born to make a pair. Break down the boundaries between the two means not only to create a new network application, but to create a new business model. The key is how to merge the interests of the enterprise, microblog and the user into a harmonious business system.

Cosmetic Games Can Be Played by IPhone

The first class cosmestic brand Lancôme recommends an interacting game about cosmestic on the best selling cell IPhone recently. The user possessed IPhone only needs to download the game in the system, and they can understand Lancome latest fashionable cosmetics information. At the same time, they can make some interesting and humorous cosmetics creation depending on moving the finger.Do You Know How ugg classic tall Prevail? A Horrible Number!

Do you want to have your own make-up and share it with your friends? Now, as long as you move on the phone touch screen with your finger, you can create a sporty dressing freely and then enjoy your works quietly, how do you not feel happy? Users who have Iphones can download this game within their systems. They can rely on moving your fingers to carry out the interesting make-up games and learn the latest Lancôme make-up information at the same time. The launch of the interactive game this time based on the Lancome cosmetics - Declaring Indigo made in the autumn and winter of 2009.Your Show Time!! OL all Are Crazy about ugg bailey button

Declaring Indigo is praise to free and uninhibited French style by Aaron de Mey, Lancôme's Creative Director of Make-up. ugg classic short , the Common Decision of Girls He has made a perfect combination of romantic French-style with the legendary Parisian uninhibited freedom of the soul. After you get into the game, you can have a panoramic view of the make-up and inspiration of Indigo Declaration. At the same time, you can use any of the products or colors of the Declaration Indigo having the creation on the face of model. whatever French style- indigo, or sparkling charm-gold or passionate-red. They all can be changed into a moving picture of make-up by moving your fingers.

Pure, saturate and strong color is my favorite color, every kind of color can throw off inconceivable glamour. This series color was the indigo and red, and it was the strong primary colors, and it was the symbol of revolution of Paris and the French. The creative director Aaron De Mey always show special preference to golden, it has the dazzling radiance, which can bring graceful and bright feeling to dressing. I believe you can create wonderful unusual cosmetics works depending on your strong creativity and imagination.

The Necessary Methods To Have A Dressing For The Beautiful W

Lost in various clothes, we have always taken “the lack of a piece of clothing forever” as a word for self-mockery before we go out. But it’s unimportant. As long you are brave enough and truly know yourself and understand the language of clothes, you can become the most beautiful woman. The spring is coming, I am afraid that a multitude of my friends will worry about changing clothes.The following is our experience,hope it can help you.Necessary Tricks that Deserve to Learn for Maintaining Your ugg classic tall

Set up your own dressing style and treat fashion objectively. The most impressed dressing master, no matter he is a celebrity or designer, the sole reason is that they create their own style. Do you like the sensibility of Sophia Loren wearing silk skirt, Jacqueline's elegant behind sun glasses, or Hepburn's elegant in black dress? A person can not irresponsibly talk about own aesthetics, but each person should have own aesthetic tendencies.
Get to this; you cannot be controlled by ever-changing fashion, while you shall merge in-fashion elements into personal taste in your appreciated aesthetic feature. For example, if you only like the lady feature of skirt, you do not need to reject pant suits that can express elegance such as wide-legged trousers and ankle length trousers.
Integration of a person's temperament, conservation, style of dress will be manifest the individuality. But the personality is the highest realm of dress of the Road. Secondly, you should match the clothes with your age, identity and position. As professor Yapote puts it, a western scholar, in the communication,
The impression of other people is consisted by 7% of your conversation, 36% of your express ways and communicates skills but 53% of the judging on whether the outlook is matching with your behavior. That is whether you look to be what you behave. Therefore, those indolent and casual student images or coddled dreamlike styles should be positively avoided after work.
With the adding of age, the changing of position, your dressing way should be match with it. Remember that, clothes is the first impressive name card. The basic clothes are always your king card. The popular of clothes wouldn't cease. Numberless clothes designers are making the fashion day by day. The new trend doesn't have the end.
But some basic fineries,like knee dress,costume tweed loose-bodied long trousers,white shirt and so on,are out of the parlance of popular or not.Those are the "evergreen tree among the clothes" ,forever new and never out of date even after 10 years. These dresses are the “dominating treasure” in your wardrobe, not only wear beautiful but also last long, absolutely a worth. Owning them, you just need to choose some dresses in fashion to match according to the fashion trend of each year and season. Buy cloth which is in coherence with your stature, complexion and temperament, the fine show windows and refined shops in franchised stores are well-designed by professionals, the purpose is to create a special atmosphere to extrude the winningness of the clothes. But those who wear or display in the model has beautiful clothes on the shelf is not necessarily suitable for you. Do not miss in the exquisite lighting and shopping guide lobbying illusion caused by lost himself.
In order to avoid being confused by temporary shopping atmosphere, completely knowing yourself is an important basic course. Only by understanding your own shape, temperament and complexion can you buy right dresses. Do remember, no women of one's own image is fully satisfied, you, too, but do not surround by this kind of regret,understand one's own strengths and weaknesses, absolutely help you to wear clothing with a unique beauty. Clothing is attached to people.

Ten Strangest Sweetmeat Around The World

This world is full of wonders, including candy. Following are several kinds of the world's most bizarre candy.Come to Buy Must-Own Abercrombie & Fitch ! They Are Now at the Most Competitive Price!

London: Percy Piglet candy Recently, a kind of candy is called Percy piggy British VOGUE magazine definition of British VOGUE became instantly. Tips you Should Remember the Top 5 ugg classic tall of the Month at Once! You Will be Impressed! This candy from the first world war penny candy. Design Most Charming Collections of ugg classic short Manufacturers modify candy into smiling face pig to attract customers. Of course, the pig sugar taste quite good.

A hobbyist said, while eatting the piglet candy, tongue feeling like sucking the champagne. There are similar piglet candy in Canada and other European countries, but the authentic Percy Piglet candy is only selled in "Marks and spencer". Turkey: pishmanive The pishmaniye from Turkey tastes soft, fluffy and not very sweet. It melts once in the mouth, like the cotton candy. New Zealand: Chocolate Fish

Chocolate is not a fish, but fish in preserves the dark chocolate. This is New Zealand's favorite. Born in 50s of the 20th century, this small desserts have already integrated into the life and culture of new zealanders,many people takes it as a gift.This kind of candy is popular in New Zealand, but no one can explain why it called "Fish". Finland: Salty liquorice It is just like an adventurous journey when tasting Salty liquorice, salty and exciting, and you will never find it boring. The other Nordic countries people, such as the Danes, but also use salt licorice to flavore vodka or fish, sometimes they also make their pets taste the candy. Austrian: Mozart candy Authentic Salzburg Mozart chocolate ball is glossy in the surface, and tastes crisp, is mainstream chocolate fans' favorite.

In the four Voltaire exlusive shops, and other candy that named after Austral personages such as physical scientist Kepler, the price of purchasing a bar of such chocolate is no more than 20 dollars. Pairs:Gold Chocolate In France country, life is art. The top chocolate master Patrick Roger is praised by his unique created taste, including his 3 feet high candy box.

Seven Negulations Maintaining Perfect Shap for Ladies

Each girl want to have a perfect figure, but how to reach to this goal?Then, seven tips as follows ensure you a perfect stature. 8 Easy Tips to Preserve ugg classic cardy Stock Count Most Glamorous ugg classic tall for Hotties

Secret 1: Do have breakfast. Breakfast is the source of your everyday energy. Without breakfast, you would be out of spirits all day long which is very unhealthy.Morever, calories are easy to be consumed due to activities in the daytime. It is easy to get fat instead if intaking food at night.

Tip two: select suitable underwears. You need to wear suitable underwears to form and keep perfect stature.It is difficult to detect the fattening if the size is larege; but it makes figure terrible if the size is small and the flesh are squeezed out.

Secret 3: Don't wear high heals too often. Many girls wear high heals everyday to look beautiful.When you are walking on high heels, the center of gravity may fall outside the feet, which will do harm to your bones, seriously, change your body look. You may got many problems, such as thumb exstrophy.

Secret 4: Don't chiociaq. Many people would sit like chiociaq or with their feet crossed. It would cause bad influence to the figure sitting like this all the time.It is easy to lead to the fact that pelvic bones bending, muscle attach the wrong place, figure will be quite terrible-looking.

Tip 5: Pay attention to your sleeping position. The best sleeping position is lying your backs, you can fall to sleep in physical and mental relaxation naturally and with a good quality.If you sleep on your side with wrong position, it will affect your backbone and bowels. Sleeping face-down may add pressure to your heart.

Tip 6: You should have immersion bath as many as possible. Have a shower can promote metabolism and physical and mental relaxation, immersion bath will produce a special result when you are in hot water.If the time is permitted, you can have a shower at your will to relieve all your pressure.

Tip 7: fall asleep at 12:00. After sleep every night body's secretion of various hormones is the most productive, if at this time late you stay up, it will cause endocrine disorders, but if you have midnight snack, it will be bad similarily on the skin and the body.

Eminem Knock Back Mariah Carey by His New Song

The bickering between Eminem and the couple Mariah Carey, Nick Cannon has stopped for a while, but now it comes a new wave. 10 Whys and Wherefores That Will Bring about Harm to Your ugg classic cardy

This was resulted from Mariah Carey acted a man who was addicted to her in the MV of her new single "obsessed". You Know What? I Bought a Capturing ugg classic cardy for My Mother at a Very Low PriceThe man traced her, snapshotted with a candid camera, put up Maria Carey's posters all over his room. His apperance was totally Eminem's signature look.She uses it to imply Eminem, and at the end of the MV, that enthusiastic fan is killed in a car accident.

Furthermore, Mariah Carey says a lot of harsh and mean words in the lyrics.The general meaning is that I am a super star,since you know you do not suit with me ,why you still fascinate with me?

Eminem flew into rage immediately, and he invited Dr. Dre to creat a song called The Warning.>Interestingly, the song includes lots of Mariah Carey's music and telephone recording of Mariah Carey and Eminem.

In the song "The Warning",Eminem says:"The reason for making this song is that you deny you used to like me and fascinate with me,but now you say that I am sick,I'm tired of counting how many times you flied to see me.You said I embarrased you and I destroyed your career path, who cares about your career path?I'm telling you that it's you destroyed my career, I am much more famous than you, stop lying, are you still loving me? I am not in love with you any more."

Apple's IPad Is Possibly Savior Rescuer

Maybe the public still remember that the founder of Apple Jobs once said: it is not important whether the kindle is good or bad, it is important that people do not read any longer. 40% of American read less than on book last year (2008). The whole concept is wrong from the first, because people do not read any longer. After he said the words, the observers who are familiar with Jobs’ style believe that Apple will enter the e-book market quickly; they said that “when Jobs constantly criticize the rival’s products and belittle the importance or he said that Apple does not pursue the particular market, it is time to prepare the key step.”Well!! Most Adaptive ugg classic tall Are Available

At present, iPad has not been in the market, its iBooks store has stir the digital reading market. Blanchetteâ€™s Reason for Abercrombie & Fitch iPad builds a new foundation for emotional reading. Some Details to Protect Your ugg classic short "New York Times" thinks that”The most important key function of iPad is its iBooks store.” Although the words are exaggerated and may promote the website, it is a killer for iPad to focus on the application of multimedia. Compared with Kindle DX of Amazon, the color and entertainment are the moat important and attractive for the customers. Kindle focuses on imitating the reading sense of traditional books, for the people who surf the internet and read the magazines, the emergence of iPad poses threaten to the traditional reading sense. With strong brand appeal, iPad will promote the acceleration of e-book reader upgrade. After all, seeing from the present situation, the colorful screen of 9.7 inch makes the online magazine and web page restore the original vitality, is it the future of digital reading? The terminal which focuses on the reading will still survive, but the colorful electronic paper and the E-book reader which stands for the technological innovation and breakthrough will become the products in next market competition. Kindle and iPad will all become the transitional products, and iPad will be the pusher of E-book price and channel war.

According to the statistics of Flurry Analytics, since the App Store appeared in 2008 July, the largest number of program is the games types. But since last September, the number of E-book firstly exceeds the game type applications. At present, there is one fifth of applications are E-book, all kinds of books will be transferred into E-books and sent to App Store to be sold better but the publishers. The supply of electronic resources has formed certain scale.It can be predicted that using theh similar mode of iPhone application shop, iPad can provide new E-book platform for the publishers, and the iBooks store is likely to bring new integrated reading industrial chain. If we look back the former success of Apple “iPod + iTunes” ecosystem, we will find that it is a closed ecological system: Apple operates the iTunes Store freely and makes huge profits from the sale of hardware. Then, as consumer electronics, can Apple strengthen the attraction of buying the hardware by iBooks Store? Apple will allows publishers independent Pricing and provides 70% of the revenue sharing as well as loose pricing policy, which is another piece of information that makes Amazon, Sony and other companies afraid.

It is reported that the price of the new E-books sold by Apple will be between 8 to 15 dollars, while the open ePub means the E-books can be used in other devices that support the ePub, which will broaden the resources of industry chain for Apple. The read industry chain will from the new order. From the debate that the five top publishers require Amazon to increase the price as well as the grade of sharing ratio and agents, we can see that in the new digital industry chain, iPad, kindle and Nook not only struggle the users, but also devolved legislative power for the publishers and the famous writers. The publishers and writers begin to seek greater rights for they are more freedom, finally, the writer, publishers and the distributors will all have their reasonable price range. After all, with the development of internet, the platform is the trend. From the content to service, from the hardware to readers, forming the new reading system using the content advantage and service worth, which is not a simple problem by simple “content and device”, and there is long way to go.

Imitate the Ways of Vanke to Manage Its Personnel

Shenzhen Vanke is a representative enterprise in real estate industry, ranking in the top of the Global Best Small Enterprises in Forbes Magazine. Women in Zaragoza all Love to Wear ugg classic cardy A batch of talented people who owe passion and profession knowledge gather in Vanke and form a company atmosphere of pursuing innovation and their own mode of human resource management. 3 Grounds that May Bring Spot to Your Florid ugg classic short This mode of human resource management mainly contains relying on professional managers, setting up young talented people's team and creating internet communication's plat.

Vanke thinks that professional manager is the third element for modern enterprise to survive and expand, which is the entrepreneurship based on the human, financial and material. Therefore, Wanke introduced the “professional managers’ year” to train and develop professional managers. The measure aims at the sustainable development of professional manager and the improvement of the company’s operation and management capability. For the management construction, the company is devoting itself to the canonical management to create wider space for directly exchanging the professional managers’ professional quality to productivity.

Vanke has another unbeaten secret, which is composition and training of young talents ladder. Vanke, as a learning organization, needs to add new blood, and continuous learning and innovation. So Wanke pays great attention to the establishment of young teams and provide the best “imaginative area” for the growth of young people. For new comers, they put emphasis on understanding their characteristics, capability and potentiality. They arrange its staff fully according to their wills. In this way, the employees’ personal goals are connected with the company’s and the employees gain motivity of long-term development, and then the company can develop better at the same time.

In addition to the above two points, building a net exchange platform for all the employees is also a peculiarity of Wanke’s ways of making use of talents. After endeavoring to collect talents to their own place, the next thing the enterprise needs to do is to release them and blend into the enterprise’s entirety. In this part, Vanke chose network, which made Vanke’s human resource management with more affinity. On company's BBS, employee may make full use of their own creativity, organizational and management capacity. Any advice and suggestion may be come up with and there is no limitation. Senior managers can quickly pass the latest management concepts to the forefront staff of the company, a more convenient and genial way not bound up by time. Due to these features, the network platform shaped by Vanke quickly promotes the development of enterprise like an icebreaker.

Besides, Vanke is called the Huangpu Military Academy of Real Estate. Thanks to taking the lead to put forward the concept of the “professional manager”, many previous Wanke’s employees are at important post in the realty industry recently. This is the way that Vanke administrate its human resource. The advantage in human resource makes Vanke the leader in speed and quality.

Mystique of Icelanders' Long-lived

The special geological construction provides hotsprings in iceland. Attention! a Broad Range of Seductive Abercrombie & Fitch on the Cheap And at least 800 of them are natural, with the temperature above 75?. The daily use water of every family in Iceland is from springs. You can enjoy a hot and pleasant bath immediately turning on the tap. Icelanders enjoy swimming in the open air, of course in the hotsprings. And few babies in Iceland are not taken to swim in the open air swimming pool at several months old.What Present an Appearance? ugg classic cardy

The open air swimming pools are the hottest social gathering places where you can come aross statesmen, entrepreneurs and artists. Once taking off the suits, there's no more differences in occupation and identity, but the nature of oneself. So no matter what they talk about, it is quite relaxed and easy for emotional communication. In Iceland, the hotsprings are also the best choices for young lovers. Being there, lovers can not only be honest with each other, but can also be more intimate because of the hot water.

The journalist’s Icelandic friend named Jim said: “the hot spring bath is a must if you travel to Iceland in winter”. He added that the hot spring bath in Iceland is not like that in Finland where the hot spring bath is either too hot or too cold, that is like you feel too hot in sauna first and then jump into the freezing water of nearly 0?. The sudden change between hot and cold is too dangerous. However, the temperature of the hot spring bath in Iceland is to increase gradually with three-stage heat-up, which will protect skin and cardiovascular.

In the winter of Iceland, if you invite a friend to your place as a guest, it is basically the fixed item to treat him with hotspring bath in the public bathing spot. It must be an upper courteous reception by inviting guest to private bathhouse for two reasons: firstly, the private bathhouse is less and less; secondly, the private bathhouse is used only when serving elders of the family or bosom friends from far away. I was lucky to be invited to take a bath in the private hotspring pool of Crook's shanty. The more bubbles you more happy, the more bubbles the higher warm.

It is just as my friends said, the hotspring spa is Icelanders' secret of longevity.

Is Not Money Is Not Material Is Not Oof Is Not Cash Is Not F

On 16th of February in 2007, lots of businessmen and social celebs attended a charity banquet in a manor of Texas,hold by the former president Annam,which was aimed at donating to poor children in Africa. When the dinner began, an old woman took a girl and came to the entrance of the manor, and the little girl was holding a porcelain jar looked very delicate.How I Use Evernote to Organize Everything (25)

At the entrance of manor, security guard stopped the old and the young. “Welcome, please, show your invitation cards, thanks.” Anthony said. "Invitation card? Sorry, we didn't receive the invitation. She wants to come, and I accompany her", the old woman said to Anthony, stroking the head of the little girl. "I am sorry, but you can not go inside without the invitation if you are not staff." Anthony said. "Why? This is not a charity dinner? We are here to express our kindness, can't we?"What's Popular now? ugg bailey button Go Public

"My dear Lucy knew from TV about the event, to donate to the children in Africa. And she wants to do something for these kids, so she decided to give all her money in her cash box."said the old woman with a solemn expression. Anthony explained that: yes, here a charitable dinner will be held. All of the guest invited are very important people, and they will help African children generously with money. Antony stopped for a while and said: “I am very glad that you bring your loving heart here, but I think it not proper for you to enter in this situation.” "Uncle, charity is not money but heart. Right?"The little girl, who had never spoken, asked Anthony.Her words astonished Anthony."I know people who have been invited own a lot of money, and they will take out a lot of money, I do not have that much, but this is all the money I have, if I really can not enter, please help me to take this in!" After saying, the little girl Lucy gave the money pot in her hand to Anthony.

Anthony did not know whether to accept it or not, when he was still at a nonplus, someone suddenly said: "No, kid, you are right, charity is not the money, but the heart. You can enter, all those who have love can enter. " The person was an old man. He stood beside little Lucy with smile on his face. Then he bowed to the little Lucy and said a few words. Then straightened up and handed an invitation to Anthony: "Could I take her in?" After checking the invitation, Anthony saluted to the old man. "Of course, Mr Warren Buffet."

The mail role of that charitable dinner is not the advocator Annan, not Buffett who donated 3 million dollars, not Bill Gates who donated 8 million, but little Lucy who only donated 30 dollars 25 cents. And the slogan of the dinner was changed into "Charity: the donation of kindness, not money." On the next day, American media all take this slogan as the title in the report about this dinner. Having seen the report,many ordinary numerous Americans were ready to donate for those poor children in Africa.

To Appreciate Manner of Europeans

In Europe, different countries may have different gesture, but also they have the same taboo on number, color, flowers and so on. Pair With Most Eye-Catching Pieces of ugg classic short For example, people in European countries have a general taboo of "thirteen" and "Friday"; many countries consider black as a symbol of funerals; the chrysanthemums, pinks and yellow flowers should be abstained from presenting to guests in international sociable occasions. Several Temptation and Cons of ugg classic tall But because of the differences of national civilization, every European country has its own feature. For example: waving hands commonly means friendship but in Greece means “go to hell”. Therefore, remembering the following national culture and customs in different European countries is very useful in transcultural economic and trade activities.

Belgians love to combine business with entertainment. They also like to treat other people and pay attention to appearance, focusing on business partner title. Hungarian have a little sense of superstitious belief. No bird-made food could be on the table for new year feast. If so, the happiness would fly away with birds. The Danes like sauna and drinking. In business activities, a sauna or more Scotch whiskey will increase the opportunities for financing cooperation. Norwegian particular cares about punctuality. When you visit or attend a private banquet, remember to prepared flowers or candy for mistress. Do not frighten River birds (national bird of Noway) while go to a picnic. They generally treat red as a fashionable color. Germans have a genuine reputation of emphasizing efficiency. Personal relationship of Germany negotiators is very serious. They are used to wearing a former suit in any occasions (Do not put your hands in the pockets). They would send gift to single person, even under the name of company. Greeks feel like a siesta, which is caused by the subtropical climate. Therefore, they may say "good afternoon" to each other in the night and will say "good night" when they depart from each other finally. Greeks methods of doing busines is still very traditional. So far, bargain business model also can be seen everywhere, but price tag is not common. Austrians do not like to eat shrimp in the New Year period. Measures to Stay Away From Depression in the Autumn

Mental health professionals remind us that autumn is a season for depression. Then, how can we take precautions against autumn depression? Which methods are good? Besides, indoor work also becomes a reason of people's depression in Autumn. People who always work indoors are more likely to have autumn depression, especially those who have weak body and seldom have exercises. Medical study also finds that, adults are the main group who get autumn depression, with an starting age of 23.

Experts recommend that people should follow the following advices in order to prevent autumn depression. Go to bed and get up early, eat nutritious breakfast and clean up to leave home. It is not suitable to work all day continuiously. Except for noon, it is suitable to lay down your work at 10:00 a.m. and 3:00 p.m, drink a cup of tea and rest for a while.

Take extra work for no more than two hours every day. Otherwise it may lead to chronic tiredness, which would easily give rise to autumn depression if lasts for a long time. Take a walk or do a shopping after lunch, which can relax body and mind. It is also best to dance in park at night. Enlarge your life circle, make friends with people beyond your colleague circle so as to relieve your job pressure.

The most interesting way fighting against autumn pression is to climb mountains. If we do not pay attention to the daily self adjusting, it is very easy for us to suffer depression in Autumn. If you have suffered the autumnal tristimania, you must look for the psychotherapy in time, so as not to make it aggravating.

How I Use Evernote to Organize Everything (25) local time on January 12, 2010, the capital of Port au Prince, and most of the country were in serious condition. The Presidential Palace and some government departments were damaged on that day. Fortunately, René Préval, the President of the Republic of Haiti, as well as his wife are safe. Haitian Prime Minister Jean-Max Bellerive said on 13rd that the earthquake death toll in Haiti could reach 10 million. As of January 19, 2010, the estimated death toll may have been more than 20 million people.

The earthquake made buildings collapse, and many citizens were buried under the ruins, some survived and some died. The collapse made the roads in city paralized. You can see dozens of dead and injured people from the rubble. All began to shake, and people scattered around with screaming "God". Houses began to collapse and the city became a chaos.

Soon after the 7.0-magnitude earthquake, two aftershocks of 5.9 and 5.5 magnitude followed up in Haiti, wrecking the local headquarter of UN peacekeeping force. The whole world began to help Haiti after the tragedy happened, and many countries promised to give Haiti humane help, providing 10000000 dollars for emergency. The secretary-general Ban Ki-moon said in a statement on the 13th, he and the United Nations was textremely concerned about he people in Haiti, and he would closely follow the development. He has decided to send Edmond Mulet, the Special Representative of the Secretary-General and head of mission of MINUSTAH to Haiti, and he would visit Haiti as soon as possible.

The World Bank delegated a disaster situation assessing team, which is mainly responsible for assessing the damage of the earthquake and assisting with the establishment of methods of post-quake reconstruction. The World Bank also said that it would urgently mobilize a batch of relief materials for Haiti. The World Bank indicated Haiti now owns 38 million dollars’ interest-free loans offered by it, accounting for 4% of the country’s whole foreign debt. In view the crisis in Haiti brought by the earthquake. World Bank decided to waive the loans in accordance with the terms of the repayment of capital in the next five years, and they will commitment to cancel the remaining debt.

The European Commission has also decided to provide 3 million Euros for emergency to aid earthquake victims in Haiti, and they will provide the follow-up assistance after the further disaster assessment in Haiti. In addition, WFP also give out high-energy biscuits and other food that doesn't need to cook in earthquake-stricken areas in Haiti; At the same time, WFP also prepares providing food rations for 200 million people in the next six months. Obama said the United States is preparing to aid Haiti where happened earthquake.Obama claimed his concern of the people of Haiti affected by earthquake and sustained attention to the incident progress. He also said he will do a preparation to help the Haitian people. The report organized by doctors without borders said that at least two hospitals were in good condition, and their doctors will begin to prepare to sevive for about 500 people who needed emergency surgery.

Although international commuties give many aids of efforts to Haiti, they still can not bring these people who have died back to life. It is not the first time for Haiti to experience such a disastrous earthquake. The island La Españ where Haiti is located is a place with frequent earthquake so many earthquakes shocked this region in history, of which one happened in 1751, at that time, the island was still in charge of French colonialists.

Precautions About Various Jewelry Wearing

As the quality of life improved, wearing jewelry has been fashionable choice for modern ladies. Go ugg classic short which Eva Mendes Love most Dazzling dimonds, verdurous jadeite have indeed increased the gloss of the female. Britney Spears Prove You to Have On Chicest Abercrombie & Fitch However, the disadvantages of wearing jewelry are revealed day by day. The diseases caused by jewelry was called jewelry syndrome in medical field. The main expressions of jewelry syndrome are as follows.

Jewelry dermatitis: some women wear rings and necklaces may cause contact dermatitis on neck or fingers, causing skin itch, erythema, peeling, pimples, or even trigger asthma or systemic urticaria. Part infection: piercing ear holes or tongue holes or nose holes, these parts may get infected because of careless disinfection or careless nurse. The organ may also get hurt because of the friction pushing of jewelry, which can cause infection. To cause deformity: The most common is the ringlike deformity about fingers or toes. Some people even do not put off the ring when they sleep at night because they wear it for a long time. It'll result in insufficient blood supply, and cause the lower part with hyperplasia or persistent partial infection, so that you have abnormal fingers or toes. Some ethnic minority areas, for wear heavy silver earrings, stretch ear length to more than ten centimeters, or even large lobe shoulder. The birth of cancer: it is comparatively stable of pure gold or silver jewelry, but in the exploration and tooling process, there may retains small quantity of radioactive materials, such as polonium, cobalt, radium, etc. As soon as people wearing jewelry contained radioactive material may damage to blood and bone and nerve these systems and even make the body suffer cancer.

Another point to note, bracelets and bracelets should better not to wear on the right hand, because in the life we used more right hand, especially women working in the office. When using the computer, the wrist intensive, repeated and excessive activity. After a long time, the wrist joint will be paralysis and painful, especially moving it such as carrying items, twisting towel even shaking hand with friends. There are many tendons and nerves in brachial canal. As all the tendons move through the bronchial canal, the bracelet or hand chain will hurt the wrist no matter how thin the bracelet or hand chain is. Most injuries are tendon and ligaments in wrist hole, but also cause severe muscle atrophy, tendon strain, or even as "carpal tunnel syndrome." Therefore, there shouldn't be any substance on lady's right wrist. Beautiful bracelet and bangle should be worn on left wrist.

In addition, you should also pay attention to not hurt your skin for wearing jewelry. Under the microscope, the bacteria on the part wearing jewelry is far more than those parts without any jewelry and there are many bacteria and soil all over the surface of jewelry. Especially when the weather becomes hot and you will sweat much easily cause the skin produce infection. You need to develop a habit of taking off the jewelry as soon as you get back home, to give your wrist a rest, besides, bracelets, bracelets should be regularly cleaned to prevent skin infections.

The voice of an imam was spread from a high-pitch loudspeaker and reverberates in the valley, breaking the silence in the sky. I was awakened by the voice which pervaded the darkness and reverberated lingeringly in the sky of the city! I did not know how long it last, as the daylight is coming, the shops near the street wake up and the banks open the doors as well as the vehicles moved with roar, then the pedlars near the streets lay stall and the streets are full of passengers. Everyone living on the African continent is an acrobat. A big thing of such a size put on a head can be absolutely still if the person removes his hands. The Africans who have goods on the heads were so skillful that they walk on streets and lanes with great ease.

The shadow of the building on the sidewalk was smaller and smaller, the sun was higher and higher. Burdened with my camera and some lens, I walked under the hot sun. The anathema of the sun could not prevent shooting and touring. I come across the streets and lanes and arrived at the freedom fighters monument in Ascari which is a monument to commemorate the soldiers who fight the colonialists at the expense of their lives in First World War. The sculpture of the soldiers armed with firearms seemed so serious and solemn under the sun. Bursts of sea breeze was blowing and touching my face, the refreshing breeze wiped away the sweats on the skin, and also took away my weariness caused by walking. At that time, there were a damp savour of fish in the air and an uproar. Several wooden boats were nodding in the sea just liked the cradles. Those were fishing vessels that were full in fish, they which worked whole night came back in the sea.

A slim shadow blocked my eyesight; it is a tall Gothic church of spire stands in the blue sky. The white wall seems more white against the blue sky which seems symbolize the sanctity of the church. I came into the bawn of Catholic church and I had to walked softly owing to I fear the creeping of the step disturb the church which fell asleep. It is quiet around the church except the sound of the falling leaves only the gentle sound of the wind as melodious as a hymn of the choir.

I walk in th e street. Unconsciously, I come to Hindu temple. Faltering in front of the gate, I dare not rush into the temple. An Indian inside the temple notices that I look at the temple at the gate and he warmly welcomes me to come inside. Seeing that I carry a camera, he gives a hint that I can take photos. The devot follower stands barefoot in front of the shrine and prays for God's blessing silently. Which does he pray for, the success, or the longevity? Only God can know besides he himeself. Through the three major religions in Dar es Salaam, that is, the Islamism, the Christianity, and the Buddhism, I feel that Tanzanians are much more tolerant about religions and ethnics. Here, different religions can live in harmony and compatibility.
